subject: Re: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA
CENTRAL BUSINESS DISTRICT,
P.M.B 0187,GARKI, ABUJA- NIGERIA,

Dear Mr Justin,

Thank you so much for your email. I am so happy as your Alive based on that
GOD will give you more years to come.

Mr.Justin, that is the problem we are having here in our bank. After some
time some people will come up to claim the Fund does not belong to them.

Since you're still Alive i am going to try my best to make sure you receive
this $35Million Dollars. All I need from you is honesty.

As I have started working on your Payment I would like you to confirm the
below information to me immediately.

A. YOUR FIRST AND YOUR LAST NAME...................

B. YOUR REAL BANKING INFORMATION...................

C. YOUR CONTRACT AMOUNT.....................

D. YOUR COMPANY NAME AND ADDRESS..............

E. YOUR HOME ADDRESS.................

F. YOUR MOBILE PHONE NUMBER............

G. YOUR AGE................
Thanks
Mr. Ken Benson
